lessons.japanese: 君は自分の無知を恥じるべきである。
lessons.indonesian: You should be ashamed of your ignorance.

lessons.japanese: あなたは恥じるべきだ。
lessons.indonesian: You ought to be ashamed of yourself.

lessons.japanese: 分別ある人ならそうすることを恥じるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: A man of sense would be ashamed to do so.

lessons.japanese: 貧乏であることを恥じるな。
lessons.indonesian: Don't be ashamed of being poor.

lessons.japanese: 自分の行動を恥じるべきだ。
lessons.indonesian: You should be ashamed of your behavior.

lessons.japanese: 自分の過ちを告白するのに恥じる必要は何もない。
lessons.indonesian: There is no need to be ashamed of confessing one's mistakes.

lessons.japanese: 試験に失敗したからといって恥じる必要はない。
lessons.indonesian: You needn't be ashamed because you failed the exam.
